commentBody: 41 World Series appeances, 27 wins, but only 1 this century.  If they never win it all again, I know I've seen seen more than my share of champions, 14 in my lifetime. Spoiled, as I know I am, doesn't constrain me from commenting. The geriatric Yankees Cashman et al have saddled on Girardi will never win. Last year's starting regulars rarely had more than one player under 30. This year they may have two, occasionally three. No postseason, the only miracle I'm hoping for is televised baseball: Xfinity&Yes=Zero yankee games on tv.  41 27 1 14 0.
